title: Daylight
content:
There are areas of the Shadow Cursed Lands where the spell might fail.

Lvl 3 Spells Animate Dead ♦ Beacon of Hope ♦ Bestow curse ♦ Blinding Smite ♦ Blink ♦ Call Lightning ♦ Celestial Haste ♦ Conjure Barrage ♦ Counterspell ♦ Crusader's Mantle ♦ Elemental Weapon ♦ Fear ♦ Feign Death ♦ Fireball ♦ Fly ♦ Gaseous Form ♦ Glyph of Warding ♦ Grant Flight ♦ Haste ♦ Hunger of Hadar ♦ Hypnotic Pattern ♦ Lightning Arrow ♦ Lightning Bolt ♦ Mass Healing Word ♦ Paralyzing Ray ♦ Plant Growth ♦ Protection from E
